name: Accurate Shot
description: You are an exceptional shot and know where to shoot an enemy in order to inflict maximum damage. You deal your Accurate Shot level in extra Damage with all ranged weapons.

name: Acute Sense
description: One of your primary five senses is highly developed, allowing you to spot what others miss.

name: Aethyric Attunement
description: Your experience, talent or training lets you more safely manipulate the Winds of Magic. You do not suffer a Miscast if you roll a double on a successful Channel Test.

name: Alley Cat
description: You are at home in shadowy backstreets and urban environments. When using Stealth (Urban), you may reverse the dice of any failed Test if this will score a Success.

name: Ambidextrous
description: You can use your off-hand far better than most folk, either by training or innate talent.

name: Animal Affinity
description: Wild animals feel comfortable in your presence, and often follow your lead.

name: Arcane Magic
description: You either study one of the 8 Arcane Lores of Magic — Beasts, Death, Fire, Heavens, Metal, Shadow, Light, or Life — or practice a lesser known Lore, such as Hedgecraft or Necromancy.

name: Argumentative
description: You are used to arguing your points and winning debates through force of personality.

name: Artistic
description: You have a natural talent for art, able to produce precise sketches with nothing but time and appropriate media.

name: Attractive
description: Whether it's your piercing eyes, your strong frame, or maybe the way you flash your perfect teeth, you know how to make the best use of what the gods gave you.

name: Battle Rage
description: You are better able to control your Frenzy in combat, channelling your rage more effectively. You can end your Frenzy with a successful Cool Test at the end of the round.

name: Beat Blade
description: You are trained to make sharp controlled blows to your opponent's weapon, creating an opening for an attack or simply impeding an incoming attack.

name: Beneath Notice
description: The high and mighty pay no attention to your presence, knowing you are well beneath their notice.

name: Berserk Charge
description: You hurl yourself at your enemies with reckless abandon, using the force of your charge to add weight to your strikes.

name: Blather
description: Called 'opening your mouth and letting your belly rumble' in [[Nordland]], or simply 'bullshitting' in [[Ostland]], blathering involves talking rapidly and incessantly about inconsequential or...

name: Bless
description: You are watched over by one of the Gods and can empower simple prayers.

name: Bookish
description: You are as at home in a library as a seaman at sea or a farmer a-farming. When using Research, you may reverse the dice of any failed Test if this will score a success.

name: Break and Enter
description: You are an expert at quickly breaking down doors and forcing entry.

name: Briber
description: You are an exceedingly skilled briber, knowing exactly how much to offer and when.

name: Cardsharp
description: You are used to playing, and winning, at cards, although your methods may involve a little cheating.

name: Careful Strike
description: You are skilled at hitting your enemy exactly where you want to, either at range or in melee.

name: Carouser
description: You are a seasoned drinker and know how to party hard. You may reverse the dice of any failed Consume Alcohol Test if this will score a Success.

name: Cat-tongued
description: Like Ranald the Trickster God, you blend truth and lies as if there were no difference.

name: Catfall
description: You are nimble and balanced like a cat, and are able to fall much greater distances unharmed than others might.

name: Chaos Magic
max: Number of Spells available in chosen Chaos Magic Lore
description: By accident or design you have lost a portion of your soul to one of the Dark Gods, and can now practice the foul magics of Chaos.

name: Combat Aware
description: You are used to scanning the battlefield to make snap decisions informed by the shifting tides of war.

name: Combat Master
description: Your accumulated years of combat experience allow you to keep lesser fighters at bay.

name: Combat Reflexes
description: You react like a flash of lightning in combat situations. Add 10 to your Initiative for each level in this Talent when determining Combat Initiative.

name: Commanding Presence
description: Your presence fills others with hushed awe and admiration.

name: Concoct
description: You are skilled at making potions, philtres, and draughts on the go.

name: Contortionist
description: You can bend and manipulate your body in a myriad of seemingly unnatural ways.

name: Coolheaded
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Willpower Characteristic.

name: Crack the Whip
description: You know how to get the most out of your animals when speed is essential. When an animal you control is Fleeing or Running, it gains +1 Movement if you are using a whip.

name: Craftsman
description: You have true creative talent in a specific trade or craft.

name: Criminal
description: You are an active criminal making money from illegal sources, and you're not always quiet about it.

name: Deadeye Shot
description: You always hit an opponent right between the eyes… or wherever else you intended to hit.

name: Dealmaker
description: You are a skilled businessman who knows how to close a deal.

name: Detect Artefact
description: You are able to sense when magic lies within an artefact.

name: Diceman
description: You are a dicing master, and all claims you cheat are clearly wrong.

name: Dirty Fighting
description: You have been taught all the dirty tricks of unarmed combat.

name: Disarm
description: You are able to disarm an opponent with a careful flick of the wrist or a well-aimed blow to the hand.

name: Disciple of Change
description: When you gain a mutation, roll twice and choose one of the two results.

name: Distract
description: You are trained in simple movements to distract or startle your opponent, drawing eyes from your true intent.

name: Doomed
description: At the age of 10, a Priest of [[The Cult of Morr|Morr]] called a Doomsayer took you aside to foretell your death in an incense-laden, coming-of-age ritual called the Dooming.

name: Double Life
description: So adept are you at maintaining your [[4. SRD/Talents/Secret Identity|Secret Identity]], that you are able to live two completely separate lives. When you purchase this Talent, you may enter into...

name: Drilled
description: You have been drilled extensively in formation fighting. When in close combat with one or more allies within 5 yards, all parties gain +1 SL to melee tests.

name: Dual Wielder
description: When armed with two weapons, you may attack with both for your Action.

name: Embezzle
description: You are skilled at skimming money from your employers without being detected.

name: Enclosed Fighter
description: You have learned to make the most benefit out of fighting in enclosed spaces.

name: Etiquette
description: You can blend in socially with the chosen group so long as you are dressed and acting appropriately.

name: Fast Hands
description: You can move your hands with surprising dexterity. Bystanders get no passive Perception Tests to spot your use of the Sleight of Hand Skill, instead they only get to Oppose your Sleight of Hand...

name: Fast Shot
description: If you have a loaded ranged weapon, you can fire it outside the normal Initiative Order before any other combatant reacts in the following Round.

name: Fearless
description: You are either brave enough or crazy enough that fear of certain enemies has become a distant memory.

name: Feint
description: You have trained how to make false attacks in close combat to fool your opponent.

name: Field Dressing
description: You are used to treating wounds quickly under pressure.

name: Fisherman
description: You are a very capable fisherman and know all the best ways to land fish.

name: Flagellant
description: You have dedicated your pain to the service of your God.

name: Flee!
description: When your life is on the line you are capable of impressive bursts of speed. Your Movement Attribute counts as 1 higher when Fleeing.

name: Fleet Footed
description: You gain +1 to your Movement Attribute. This is a permanent increase to your Movement characteristic.

name: Frenzy
description: You can Frenzy as described in the Psychology rules. You can enter a state of Frenzy, gaining significant combat bonuses but losing some control over your actions.

name: Frightening
description: Anyone sane thinks twice before approaching you. If you wish, you have a Fear Rating of 1. Add +1 to this number per extra time you have this Talent.

name: Furious Assault
description: Your blows follow one another in quick succession, raining down on your opponents with the fury of Ulric.

name: Gregarious
description: You just like talking to other folk and it seems they like talking to you. You may reverse any failed Gossip Test if this allows the Test to succeed.

name: Gunner
description: You can reload blackpowder weapons with practiced ease. Add SL equal to your level in Gunner to any Extended Test to reload a Blackpowder weapon.

name: Hardy
description: You gain a permanent addition to your Wounds, equal to your Toughness Bonus. If your Toughness Bonus should increase, then the number of Wounds Hardy provides also increases.

name: Hatred
description: You are consumed with hatred for something in the Old World, as described in the Psychology rules.

name: Holy Hatred
description: Your prayers drip with the hatred you feel for your blasphemous enemies. You deal +1 Damage with Miracles for each level in this Talent.

name: Holy Visions
description: You clearly see the great works of the Gods all around you.

name: Hunter's Eye
description: You are a skilled hunter and know all the best techniques to find game.

name: Impassioned Zeal
description: When you talk about your cause, case, or religion, your words fill with passion and fervent zeal.

name: Implacable
description: It takes a lot to finish you off. You can ignore the Wound loss from a Bleeding Condition. Each level in this Talent lets you ignore the Wound loss from an extra Bleeding Condition.

name: In-fighter
description: You are skilled at drawing in close to an opponent. You suffer no penalties for fighting against an opponent with a longer weapon than you. Further, if you use the optional rules for In-fighting,...

name: Inspiring
description: Your rousing words and pleas can turn the tide of a battle.

name: Instinctive Diction
description: You instinctively understand the language of Magick, and are capable of articulating the most complex phrases rapidly without error.

name: Invoke
description: You are blessed by one of the Gods and can empower one of your Cult's Miracles.

name: Iron Jaw
description: You are made of sturdy stuff and can weather even the strongest blows.

name: Iron Will
description: You have an indomitable will of iron, and will never willingly bow down before another.

name: Jump Up
description: You are hard to keep down. You may perform a Challenging (+0) Athletics Test to immediately regain your feet whenever you gain a Prone Condition. This Athletics Test is often modified by the...

name: Kingpin
description: You have earned an air of respectability despite your nefarious ways. You may ignore the Status loss of the [[4. SRD/Talents/Criminal|Criminal]] Talent.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Agility Characteristic.

name: Linguistics
description: You have a natural affinity for languages. Given a month's exposure to any Language, you count the associated Language Skill as a Basic Skill with a successful Intelligence Test (which can be...

name: Lip Reading
description: You can tell what people are saying by simply watching their lips; you do not need to hear what they are saying.

name: Luck
description: They say when you were born, Ranald smiled. Your maximum Fortune Points now equal your current Fate points plus the number of times you've taken Luck.

name: Magic Resistance
description: You are resistant to magic. The SL of any spell affecting you is reduced by 2 per point you have in this Talent. The SL of a spell is only modified by the highest Magic Resistance Talent within...

name: Magical Sense
description: You are able to sense the Winds of Magic in others. You may attempt an Average (+20) Intuition Test whenever you encounter a spellcaster. If you pass, you sense the target is a witch. Further, if...

name: Magnum Opus
description: You are an undisputed master in your field, able to create work of such incredible complexity others can but sit back and marvel at your genius.

name: Marksman
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Ballistic Skill. This does not count towards your Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Master of Disguise
description: You are an expert at taking on the appearance and mannerisms of others.

name: Master Orator
description: You are skilled at firing up crowds. You gain a SL bonus equal to your levels of Master Orator to any Charm Test when Public Speaking before a crowd.

name: Master Tradesman
description: You are exceptionally skilled at your specified Trade skill.

name: Menacing
description: You have an imposing presence. When using the Intimidate Skill, gain a SL bonus equal to your levels of Menacing.

name: Mimic
description: You have a good ear for accents and dialects, and can reproduce them accurately.

name: Night Vision
description: You can see very well in natural darkness. Assuming you have at least a faint source of light (such as starlight, moonlight, or bioluminescence) you can see clearly for 20 yards per level of Night...

name: Nimble Fingered
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Dexterity. This does not count towards your Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Noble Blood
description: You are either born into the nobility, or otherwise elevated to it by in-game events.

name: Nose for Trouble
description: You are used to getting into, and preferably out of, trouble.

name: Numismatics
description: You are well versed with the different coinage of the Old World, and are adept at determining their value.

name: Old Salt
description: You are an experienced seaman, and are very used to sea life.

name: Orientation
description: You have an instinctual feel for direction. You automatically know which direction is north with a glimpse at the stars, trees, or whatever other signs you are familiar with.

name: Panhandle
description: You are a skilled beggar, able to get even the most jaded individual to contribute to your cause. You can perform a Charm Test every half hour when Begging, not every hour.

name: Perfect Pitch
description: You have perfect pitch, able to replicate notes perfectly and identify them without even making a Test.

name: Petty Magic
description: You have the spark to cast magic within you and have mastered techniques to control it at a basic level.

name: Pharmacist
description: You are highly skilled at pharmacy, better able than most to make pills, ointments, unguents, oils, creams, and more.

name: Pilot
description: You are skilled at leading vessels through dangerous waters.

name: Public Speaker
description: You are a skilled orator and know how to work large groups of people.

name: Pure Soul
description: Your soul is pure, quite resistant to the depredations of Chaos. You may gain extra Corruption points equal to your level of Pure Soul before having to Test to see if you become corrupt.

name: Rapid Reload
description: You can reload ranged weapons with practiced ease. You add SL equal to your level in Rapid Reload to any Test to reload a ranged weapon.

name: Reaction Strike
description: Your fast reactions have allowed you to fell many opponents before they have even swung their blades.

name: Read Write
description: You are one of the rare literate individuals in the Old World. You are assumed to be able to read and write (if appropriate) all of the Languages you can speak.

name: Relentless
description: When you have your mind set on a target, there is nothing anyone can do to stop you reaching them.

name: Resistance
description: Your strong constitution allows you to more readily survive a specific threat.

name: Resolute
description: You launch into attacks with grim determination. Add your level of Resolute to your Strength Bonus when you Charge.

name: Reversal
description: You are used to desperate combats, able to turn even the direst circumstances to your Advantage.

name: Riposte
description: Conforming to 'the best defence is offence', you respond to an incoming attack with a lightning-fast counterstrike of your own.

name: River Guide
description: You know all the tricks for navigating dangerous rivers.

name: Robust
description: You are as tough as old boots and just soak up damage.

name: Roughrider
description: You are at home in the saddle in even the most difficult of circumstances, and know how to get the best out of your mount during conflict.

name: Rover
description: You are at home roaming the wild places. When using Stealth in a rural environment, bystanders do not get passive Perception Tests to detect you; they can only spot you if they are specifically on...

name: Savant
description: You are exceptionally learned, and have a significant degree of specialised knowledge in a single field of study.

name: Savvy
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Intelligence Characteristic.

name: Scale Sheer Surface
description: You are an exceptional climber. You can attempt to climb even seemingly impossible surfaces such as sheer fortifications, ice shelves, plastered walls, and similar, and you ignore any penalties to...

name: Schemer
description: You are a master of politics and see conspiracy around every corner.

name: Sea Legs
description: You are used to the rolling motion of the oceans, and are very unlikely to get sea sick, even in the worst storms.

name: Seasoned Traveller
description: You are an inquisitive soul who has travelled far and wide, learning all manner of local information.

name: Second Sight
description: You can perceive the shifting Winds of Magic that course from the Chaos Gates at the poles of the world.

name: Secret Identity
description: You maintain a secret identity that allows you to appear richer, or perhaps poorer, than you actually are.

name: Shadow
description: You are skilled at following people without being spotted.

name: Sharp
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Initiative Characteristic.

name: Sharpshooter
description: You can make aimed shots of exceptional accuracy. You ignore any negative Difficulty modifiers to Ranged Tests due to the size of your target.

name: Shieldsman
description: You are skilled at using your shield to manoeuvre others in combat so you can take advantage of a desperate situation.

name: Sixth Sense
description: You get a strange feeling when you are threatened, and can react accordingly.

name: Slayer
description: When determining Damage use your opponent's Toughness Bonus as your Strength Bonus if it is higher.

name: Small
description: You are much shorter than most folk in the Old World. The full rules for different Sizes are found in Chapter 12: Bestiary. This talent typically represents Halflings and other small-sized creatures.

name: Sniper
description: Distance is of no import to your shooting skills, and you are just as adept at picking off far away targets as those nearby.

name: Speedreader
description: You read books at a voracious pace. You may reverse a failed Research Test if this will grant success. If the speed at which you read is important during combat, a successful Language Test lets...

name: Sprinter
description: You are a swift runner. Your Movement Attribute counts as 1 higher when Running.

name: Step Aside
description: You are skilled at being where enemy weapons are not.

name: Stone Soup
description: You are used to getting by with less, and know how to survive lean times.

name: Stout-hearted
description: No matter how bad things get, you always seem to come back for more. You may attempt a Cool Test to remove a Broken Condition at the end of each of your Turns as well as at the end of the Round.

name: Strider
description: You are experienced in traversing difficult ground. You ignore all movement penalties when crossing over or through a specified terrain. Typical specialities include: Coastal, Deserts, Marshes,...

name: Strike Mighty Blow
description: You know how to hit hard! You deal your level of Strike Mighty Blow in extra Damage with melee weapons.

name: Strike to Injure
description: You are an expert at striking your enemies most vulnerable areas. You inflict your level of Strike to Injure in additional Wounds when you cause a Critical Wound.

name: Strike to Stun
description: You know where to hit an opponent to bring him down fast.

name: Strong Back
description: You have a strong back that is used to hard work. You may add your levels in Strong Back to your SL in any Opposed Strength Tests, and can carry additional Encumbrance points of trappings equal to...

name: Strong Legs
description: You have strong legs able to carry you great distances when you jump. Add your Strong Legs level to your SL in any Athletics Tests involving Leaping.

name: Strong Swimmer
description: You are an especially strong swimmer and used to holding your breath for a long time underwater.

name: Strong-minded
description: You are the epitome of determination and resolve. Add your level in Strong Minded to your maximum Resolve pool.

name: Sturdy
description: You have a brawny physique, or are very used to carrying things. Increase the number of Encumbrance Points you can carry by your Sturdy level x 2.

name: Suave
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Fellowship Characteristic.

name: Suffused with Magic
description: All spells cast within Willpower Bonus yards of you gain +1 SL to cast. This Bonus may only be claimed once per casting, no matter how many Characters with this Talent are in the vicinity.

name: Super Numerate
description: You have a gift for calculation and can work out the solution to most mathematical problems with ease. You may use a simple calculator to represent what your PC is capable of mentally computing.

name: Supportive
description: You know what to say and when to make the most impact upon your superiors.

name: Sure Shot
description: You know how to find the weak spots in a target's armour. When you hit a target with a Ranged weapon, you may ignore Armour Points equal to your Sure Shot level.

name: Surgery
description: You are a surgeon, able to open and close the flesh in order to heal others.

name: Tenacious
description: You never give up, no matter how impossible your travails appear.

name: Tinker
description: You are somewhat of a Johann-of-all-trades, able to repair almost anything. You count all non-magical Trade Skills as Basic when repairing broken items.

name: Tower of Memories
description: A recollection technique first instigated by the Cult of Verena, reputedly from Elven practices taught by the Loremasters of Hoeth, Tower of Memories allows you to perfectly recall a sequence of...

name: Trapper
description: You are skilled at spotting and using traps. You may take a Perception Test to spot traps automatically without having to tell the GM of your intention; the GM may prefer to make some of these...

name: Trick Riding
description: You are capable of amazing feats of agility on horseback.

name: Tunnel Rat
description: You are at home in tunnels, sewers, and other underground environments.

name: Tzeentch's Blessing
description: Tzeentch, the Chaos God of Magic, has gifted you with a worming parasite within your mind.

name: Unshakable
description: You are a jaded veteran who has survived more than one hail of shots from Blackpowder weapons.

name: Very Resilient
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Toughness Characteristic.

name: Very Strong
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Strength Characteristic.

name: War Leader
description: Your stern gaze and inspiring words motivate your soldiers to fight on to the end.

name: War Wizard
description: You are trained to cast magic while in the thick of combat.

name: Warrior Born
description: You gain a permanent +5 bonus to your starting Weapon Skill Characteristic. This doesn't count as Advances. This bonus applies to starting characteristics only and cannot be taken multiple times.

name: Waterman
description: You are an experienced freshwater sailor and are well-versed with river vessels.

name: Wealthy
description: You are fabulously wealthy, and are rarely ever short of coin. When Earning (including Income Endeavours) you secure +1 GC per time you have this Talent.

name: Well-prepared
description: You are used to anticipating the needs of others, and yourself.

name: Witch!
description: You have learned magic through trial and error. Add Language (Magick) to any Career you enter; if it is already in your Career, you may purchase the Skill for 5 XP fewer per Advance. Further, you...
